name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by twntysevn27, UntilYouAreSoNude, masterofmetroid, zcross00, dangelder, riotdejaneiro, mikeronomicon, Mangtastic, fourganger, TPman90, aargh, eatmorekix, Catachresis, JoeldeBunchastu, GeyserShitdick, dennycrane, bug, tdkg, equinn2006, NDCaesar, Semiquaver, JuanCarlos, Sargasm, atticusonline, Cracklewater, cellphonedick, pete, luckypyjamas, mistlethrush, fmercury, regrepsnefpoh, harry, choosebro, suprememongoose, nutmeg, TheSoulBear, Wite_Rabit, psykeres, yingkaixing, dropkickpikachu, Audhumla, heatbag, greyfield, stormagnet, afvbs)

name: twntysevn27
text: A comment left by twntysevn27 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by bunkzilla, goocifer, salvagebar, Mustakrakesh)

name: mikeronomicon
text: A comment left by mikeronomicon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mannequentin, riotdejaneiro, BPMead, salvagebar, Bex, fattypneumonia, thetimbrown, Panserbjorne, Satyr, Appers)

name: wite_rabit
text: Obviously, he drives a convertible mustang.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Huge slam on newborns dropped head-first out of nowhere!

name: mal3
text:
Chubbied for MST3K.

AAA WOULD CHUBBY AGAIN

name: rowboat
text: Asherdan knows what makes it funny.

name: gunsofray
text: Yes.

name: sargasm
text: I've done that sorta-laugh that T is doing in panel 5.  It is represented perfectly.

name: overmedicated
text: I thought he was just nodding forlornly in agreement. But I'm of low mind.

name: wittyname
text: It more looks like he`s shivering, imagining the hardship that Jenna is enduring.

name: tekende
text: I agree. Nodding.

name: zombiezero
text: I believe he's recalling the disaster that was his attempt to make Mickey Mouse pancakes for Philippe, and wondering if Jenna would have done any better.

name: rowboat
text: It depends on whether or not you like fake tits.

name: fermatprime
text: Philippe does not; Philippe is a hugs man.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
She's cooking Mickey Mouse pancakes......

AT DISNEYLAND!!

name: shmuckeles
text: what are they doing out there in that field? or is it just the guys chillin in the yard?

name: clockworkorange
text: They gathered in the field for the sole purpose of discussing this topic. It is a very somber occasion.

name: luckypyjamas
text: that's why Beef is wearing a dress shirt and a tie

name: canusdivinus
text: He obviously put a lot of thought into this beforehand.

name: expellens
text: ANY time Beef is wearing a dress shirt and tie is a reason for giving a 5.  Just like I give a 5 for any strip with Ray blubbering, "A BLOO BLA BLOO BLOO BLOOOO! BLOO BLOOOO! A BLOO BLA BLOOO"

name: straw
text: Beef really shines here

name: darthemed
text: I have the feeling Beef could go off like this on any topic combined with economic issues and presented as an item of discussion.

name: equinn2006
text: The Coconut Derby: A stylish derby alternative designed for the penniless, the porn industry, or both.

name: charchar
text: Or for men with apples over their faces...

name: dasilodavi
text: It just dawned on me.  Beef can truly command a conversation!

name: sidxdeadgod
text: Hang yo' heads.

name: ssink
text: when roast beef starts with his amazing detail, you know its ganna be good

name: slalvation
text: I almost wish he didn't do that, 'cause before I started reading Achewood, I thought that my penchant for "this is the sad, detailed truth (that I just made up)" monologues was a cool thing about me. Now whenever I do it I think everybody's gonna think I'm so unoriginal and just stealin' my material from webcomics like some nerd, and they are all totally gonna call me on it.

name: stormagnet
text:
I wish I could both chubby and lame this on the basis that I've been thinking the exact same thing, minus the "like some nerd." (Seriously, what is the point of even trying to deny that?)

I am suitably ashamed.

name: thorfinn
text: I know it's probably something I missed early on in the archives, but why does everyone hate this asherdan guy and lame the hell out of everything he posts?

name: vucubcaquix
text: Well, the majority of his comments are pretty dumb...

name: tonyhighwind
text:
I think it's more that the majority of people who read his comments and lame them take Phillipe entirely too seriously.

Apres moi, le deluge.

name: farqussus
text: Évidence, il n'ya pas assez pris en charge un sujet de votre mal informés des observations de commencer un déluge.

name: mockereo
text: CHING CHONG WING WONG

name: blarghamagarky
text: Ray exhibits terrible posture today.

name: charchar
text: He fears that with the adult film market being in a slump, people will turn to underground street dancing for their fix of cinematic sex and danger.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He's really depressed by the conversation. Posture is a giveaway.

name: second_cicada
text:
Because of this strip, I am tempted to one day get a Mustang convertible, so that when I drive down the street, people will wonder if I am a porn star.

I am a terrible person.

name: rowboat
text: All the best porn stars are terrible people. You'll do fine.

name: theguitarhero
text: A really good porn star lamed you.

name: rowboat
text: If it was Ivana Fuckalot, I'm so sorry, baby. I know you're a decent person. The fact that you only make porn with your steady boyfriend says a lot. That's class.

name: puguglypress
text: and she doesnt even videotape it or anything

name: rowboat
text: I fucking hope you're not implying that people who videotape themselves fucking are not classy because my mother was a fucking saint.

name: farqussus
text: the best kind of saint

name: bucklemyshoe
text: The kind of saint you can see naked

name: henry_pussycat
text: I've always wanted to read an Asherdan comment but never get the chance to because it's lamed too much. It kind of pisses me off.

name: puguglypress
text: Oh, just drop the fake profile, Asherdan! We're on to you!

name: farqussus
text: also, learn to use assetbar

name: andrewthepig
text: ...and now I know it is technically called a "Denver Boot".  Thanks Onstad.
